chargedesign

module residuesets

module with functions for selecting residuesets and functions operating on residuesets, where residuesets are lists of pyrosetta residuenumbers.

residuesets.residueset_to_composition(pose, residueset)

given a pose and residueset, returns dictionary with information about the aminoacid composition of the residueset

Parameters:

  • pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose

  • residueset (list of int) – input residueset (list of pyrosetta residuenumbers)

Returns:

dictionary with information about the aminoacid composition of the residueset

Return type:

dict

residuesets.residueset_to_charge(residueset, pose)

given a pose and residueset, returns net charge of residueset

Parameters:

  • pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose

  • residueset (list of int) – input residueset (list of pyrosetta residuenumbers)

Returns:

net charge of residueset

Return type:

int

residuesets.residueset_to_resfile(filename, residueset_nataa, residueset_allaa)

creates rosetta resfile, given residuesets with NATAA and ALAA entries

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – path for resfile

  • residueset_nataa (list of int) – residueset with NATAA entries

  • residueset_allaa (list of int) – residueset with ALLAA entries

residuesets.residueset_to_pyrosettaselector(residueset)

converts residueset to rosetta residue_selector

Parameters:

residueset (list of int) – residueset to be converted

Returns:

residue_selector

Return type:

pyrosetta.rosetta.utility.vector1_bool

residuesets.pyrosettaselector_to_residueset(selector, ntot)

converts rosetta residue_selector to residueset

Parameters:

  • selector (pyrosetta.rosetta.utility.vector1_bool) – residue_selector to be converted

  • ntot (int) – total number of residues of the residue_selector - NOT CLEAR WHY THIS IS NEEDED

Returns:

residueset

Return type:

list of int

residuesets.residueset_to_pyrosettamask(residueset, nres)

converts residueset to rosetta residue_selector (or mask) - SEEMS TO BE DUPLICATE OF residueset_to_pyrosettaselector

Parameters:

  • residueset (list of int) – residueset to be converted

  • nres (int) – total number of residues of the residue_selector

Returns:

residue_selector

Return type:

pyrosetta.rosetta.utility.vector1_bool

residuesets.residueset_close_to_target_residueset(pose, target_residueset, distance_threshold)

find residueset of residues close to residues in a target_residueset given some distance_treshold

Parameters:

  • pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose

  • target_residueset (list of int) – residueset of residues close to which we are seeking other residues

  • distance_treshold (float) – distance_treshold in Angstrom

Returns:

residueset

Return type:

list of int

residuesets.residueset_to_pymolselection(selectionname, residueset)

convert residueset to pymol scriptline for selecting these residues

Parameters:

  • selectionname (str) – name for pymol selection

  • residueset (list of int) – residueset to be converted

Returns:

pymol script line selecting the residueset and naming it selectionname

Return type:

str

residuesets.residueset_surface(pose)

get residueset of surface residues for given pose

Parameters:

pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose

Returns:

residueset of surface residues

Return type:

list of int
